name: Real F22 Fighter Jet Simulator Games
name_original: Real F22 Fighter Jet Simulator Games
description:
Being the leader of the fighter jet squadron, you are handed an assignment to defend your country against an ambush by the enemy troops.

Enemy has camped in hideouts through various locations and are planning a massive onslaught, don’t let them succeed. Fight against a massive enemy army in this Sky Wings Jet War simulation. Track down enemy hideouts and destroy enemy planes, tanks, ships and armored vehicles with air to ground attacks, eliminating each target with precision. Spread in 4 levels of fighter jet war missions, eliminate enemy bases from 4 different sectors to wipe the territory clean off them.

AIR GLORY FIGHTER JET WAR
- Superior fighter jet simulator controls for mobile devices
- 4 levels of gameplay
- Fight against various land and air enemies
- Smooth gameplay mechanism and enemy AI

CONTEND AGAINST VARIOUS LAND AND AIR FORCES

Pilot your fighter jet and contend against various land and air enemies through a course of 4 gameplay levels with varying difficulty.
